chart_description: The TCP connections resets chart tracks the rate at which TCP connections are reset on Windows systems. TCP connection resets occur when a connection is forcibly closed without completing its intended purpose. This can happen for various reasons including network congestion or connection timeouts.

dimension_descriptions.ipv6: This dimension indicates whether the chart is displaying data for IPv6 connections only. If this dimension is not present or has a value of 'all', the chart is displaying data for both IPv4 and IPv6 connections.
